data.meta_description: Where is the University of Maryland located? Â  The University of Maryland is conveniently located near Washington D.C. and is accessible by may different modes of transportation. Whether by car, plane, or train, we have solutions to get you to campus safely and easily.
data.text:
Where is the University of Maryland located?

The University of Maryland is conveniently located near Washington D.C. and is accessible by may different modes of transportation. Whether by car, plane, or train, we have solutions to get you to campus safely and easily.
